title: cargo install alacritty failed
body:
### System

_**OS:**_ 
Windows

_**Rust:**_ 
stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc (default)

_**Rustc version:**_ 
rustc 1.52.1 (9bc8c42bb 2021-05-09)

_**Rust config:**_ 
[build]
rustflags = '-C target-cpu=native'
rustc-wrapper = "sccache"

_**Clang version:**_
clang version 12.0.0
Target: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: C:\Program Files\LLVM\bin

_**Win10 Version:**_
Version 21H1 (OS Build 19043.985)

_**VS2019 Version:**_
16.10.0 Preview 2.1

### Logs
```console
> cargo install alacritty
    Updating crates.io index

  note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: failed to compile `alacritty v0.7.2`, intermediate artifacts can be found at `C:\Users\huang\AppData\Local\Temp\cargo-installAfzO1v`

  build failed
```

And when I downloaded master branch from github and ran **cargo build --release** locally, it is completely fine.
